âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Generate and customize ambient noises using Tone.js â€¢ Save, import, and export noise profiles â€¢ Fine-tune noises with audio processing tools (filters, LFOs, effects) â€¢ Upload and edit audio samples
ðŸ“– Summary: Noisedash is a self-hostable web application designed for generating and customizing ambient noises. It allows users to create personalized soundscapes by combining generated noises with uploaded audio samples, applying audio processing effects, and saving noise profiles for easy access and sharing. The application also includes admin tools for managing multiple users and is designed to be mobile-friendly.
